questions.question: Hello
questions.reply: Hello! How can I assist you today?

questions.question: What are your support hours?
questions.reply: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.

questions.question: How can I reset my password?
questions.reply: You can reset your password by clicking on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and following the instructions.

questions.question: My order has not arrived yet.
questions.reply: Please check your order status in the 'My Orders' section of your account. If the estimated delivery date has passed, kindly contact our support team with your order number.

questions.question: I am unable to log in to my account.
questions.reply: Ensure that you are using the correct email and password. If the issue persists, try resetting your password or clearing your browser cache.

questions.question: How do I contact customer support?
questions.reply: You can contact our customer support via email at support@example.com or call us at +1-800-123-4567.

questions.question: How do I cancel my order?
questions.reply: To cancel your order, go to 'My Orders', select the order, and click 'Cancel'. If the option is unavailable, the order may have already been processed.

questions.question: Can I return a product?
questions.reply: Yes, you can return a product within 30 days of purchase. Please visit our Returns section for more details.

questions.question: How long does it take to process a refund?
questions.reply: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.

questions.question: Thank you
questions.reply: You're welcome! If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

questions.question: Do you offer international shipping?
questions.reply: Yes, we offer international shipping. Shipping costs and delivery times vary based on the destination.

questions.question: How can I track my order?
questions.reply: You can track your order in the 'My Orders' section of your account. You will also receive a tracking link via email once your order is shipped.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.reply: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

questions.question: Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
questions.reply: If your order has not yet been shipped, you can update the shipping address by contacting our support team.

questions.question: How do I apply a discount code?
questions.reply: Enter the discount code at checkout in the 'Promo Code' field, and the discount will be applied automatically.

questions.question: Do you offer gift cards?
questions.reply: Yes, we offer digital gift cards. You can purchase them from our website.

questions.question: Can I exchange an item?
questions.reply: Yes, we offer exchanges within 30 days of purchase. Contact our support team to process an exchange.

questions.question: What happens if I receive a damaged item?
questions.reply: If you receive a damaged item, please contact our support team with a photo of the item, and we will assist you with a replacement or refund.

questions.question: Do you provide warranties on your products?
questions.reply: Some products come with a manufacturer warranty. Please check the product details for warranty information.

questions.question: Is my payment information secure?
questions.reply: Yes, we use secure encryption to protect your payment information.

questions.question: How do I delete my account?
questions.reply: To delete your account, please contact our support team.

questions.question: How can I update my email address?
questions.reply: You can update your email address in the 'Account Settings' section of your profile.

questions.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
questions.reply: Yes, we offer bulk discounts. Contact our sales team for more details.

questions.question: Can I pay in installments?
questions.reply: Yes, we offer installment payment options via select payment providers.

questions.question: How do I subscribe to your newsletter?
questions.reply: You can subscribe to our newsletter on our website by entering your email in the subscription box.

questions.question: How do I unsubscribe from emails?
questions.reply: You can unsubscribe by clicking the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any of our emails.

questions.question: What is your return policy?
questions.reply: You can return items within 30 days of purchase as long as they are unused and in original packaging.

questions.question: How do I request a product feature?
questions.reply: You can send us your feature request via the 'Feedback' section of our website.

questions.question: Where can I find product reviews?
questions.reply: Product reviews are available on each product page.

questions.question: Can I get a tax invoice for my order?
questions.reply: Yes, you can download your tax invoice from the 'My Orders' section.

questions.question: What happens if my package is lost?
questions.reply: If your package is lost, please contact our support team for assistance.

questions.question: How can I join your loyalty program?
questions.reply: You can sign up for our loyalty program on our website.

questions.question: Do you have a referral program?
questions.reply: Yes, we have a referral program where you can earn rewards for referring friends.

questions.question: Can I customize my order?
questions.reply: Some products allow customization. Please check product details for customization options.

questions.question: Are your products eco-friendly?
questions.reply: We offer a range of eco-friendly products. Look for the 'Eco-Friendly' tag on product pages.

questions.question: Do you ship to PO Boxes?
questions.reply: Yes, we can ship to PO Boxes.

questions.question: Can I change my payment method after placing an order?
questions.reply: Unfortunately, once an order is placed, the payment method cannot be changed.

questions.question: Do you offer same-day delivery?
questions.reply: Same-day delivery is available in select locations.

questions.question: Do you have a mobile app?
questions.reply: Yes, our mobile app is available on iOS and Android.

questions.question: How can I provide feedback?
questions.reply: You can provide feedback through our website's 'Contact Us' section.

questions.question: Thankyou
questions.reply: You're welcome! If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

questions.question: Thanks
questions.reply: You're welcome! If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

sorryMessage: Sorry, Did not understand your query!
